bill_title: provide an exemption to the axle and weight limits if the total gross weight of a vehicle is within the maximum limits.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide an exemption to the axle and weight limits if the total gross weight of a vehicle is within the maximum limits. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-22 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: A motor vehicle is not in violation of the maximum axle or tire weight limits set by § 32-22-16 or 32-22-21 due to the shifting of the load if the total gross vehicle weight of the vehicle is within the maximum limits set by §§ 32-22-16 and 32-22-21, the weight on any one axle or tandem axle does not exceed the legal limits imposed pursuant to § 32-22-16 by more than twenty percent, and the load is adjusted to the legal limits on axle and tire. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
